results.title: [Therapeutic possibilities in patients with selective pituitary resistance to thyroid hormones].
results.text_hl: Beta blockers, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Benzodiazepines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001569 @@@benzodiazepines@@@ have been used as a symptomatic therapy.
